alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 10:48AM EST until March 15 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Driftwood River near Edinburgh. East Fork White River from Columbus to Bedford. .Minor flooding will continue or develop along portions of the Driftwood, East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers for the next several days. Flooding is occurring due to significant rainfall which occurred last weekend. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The high water situation is likely to begin to improve along northern reaches of the main stem rivers within the next few days, while flooding will last longer further south. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Bedford. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.2 feet, At this level during December 2013 backwater reached the tailwater of Lake Monroe as Salt Creek stopped falling. The crest of the river followed 2 days later and reached 27.6 feet at Bedford and caused Salt Creek to rise nearly 6 feet at the tailwater of Monroe Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 21.5 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1100 PM EST.
